column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
column6: Sɛ nyimpa biara yɛ bɔn a ɔnndze enyidaho wɔ ndzɛmba biara a EWURADZE ahyɛ ho mbra dɛ mma wɔnnyɛ no mu
column7: na ɔkɛyɛ no mu kor biara a

column2: "sɛ ɔsɔfo a wɔasera no no kɛyɛ bɔn ma ɔdze asodzi ba ɔman no do a: ɔno no bɔn a ɔayɛ no ntsi
column3: ma ɔmfa ɔnantwisaa eburwa a onndzii dzɛm mbrɛ EWURADZE mfa nyɛ bɔn ho afɔr."

column2: "Na ɔmfa nantwisaa no mbra ehyiadzibuw no n’abowano wɔ EWURADZE enyim; na ɔmfa ne nsa nto nantwisaa no n’etsifi
column3: na onku no wɔ EWURADZE enyim."

column2: "Na ɔsɔfo a wɔasera no no mfa nantwisaa no no bɔgyaa no bi
column3: na ɔmfa mbra ehyiadzibuw no mu:"

column2: "na ɔsɔfo no mfa ne nsatseaba mbɔ bɔgya no mu
column3: na ɔmfa bɔgya no bi mpetse mpɛn esuon wɔ EWURADZE enyim
column4: wɔ krɔnkrɔnbea no no ntwamutam no enyim."

column2: "Na ɔsɔfo no mfa bɔgya no bi nkeka eduhuamhyew afɔrmbukyia no a ɔwɔ EWURADZE enyim no a ɔwɔ ehyiadzibuw no mu no ne mbɛn no ho; na onhue nantwisaa no no bɔgyaa nyinara ngu ɔhyew afɔr afɔrmbukyia no a ɔwɔ ehyiadzibuw no n’abowano no ase."
"Na onyi bɔn ho afɔr nantwisaa no ne seradze no nyinara mfi no ho; seradze a ɔkata ayamudze no ho no
column3: nye ayamudze no ho seradze no nyinara
column6: nye no do seradze no a ɔwɔ sisiw mu no
column10: "dɛ mbrɛ woyi fi asomdwee afɔr ayɛyɛdze nantwinyin ho: na ɔsɔfo no nhyew no wɔ ɔhyew afɔr afɔrmbukyia no do."

column2: "Na nantwisaa no no nwoma
column3: nye ne nam nyinara
column9: "mekyerɛ ɔnantwisaa mu no nyinara na ɔnsoa nkɔ nseraban no ekyir beebi a hɔ tsew
column11: na ɔmfa ogya nhyew no nyena do. Beebi a wohue nso gu no ara na wɔnhyew no."

column2: "Na sɛ Israel mboanofo nyinara fom
column3: a wɔammfa enyidaho annyɛ
column4: na wɔyɛ ndzɛmba a EWURADZE ahyɛ ho mbra dɛ mma wɔnnyɛ no mu bi

column2: "na ekyir yi wohu bɔn a wɔafom wɔ mu no a
column3: ɔno bagua no mfa nantwisaa eburwa mbra mbɛyɛ bɔn ho afɔr
column4: na wɔmfa no mbra ehyiadzibuw no enyim."

column2: "Na mboanofo no mu mpanyimfo no mfa hɔn nsa ngu nantwisaa no n’etsifi na wonku nantwisaa no wɔ EWURADZE enyim."
"Na ɔsɔfo a wɔasera no no mfa nantwisaa no no bɔgyaa no bi mbra ehyiadzibuw no mu."
"Na ɔsɔfo no mfa ne nsatseaba mbɔ bɔgya no mu
column3: na ɔmfa mpetse mpɛn esuon wɔ EWURADZE enyim wɔ ntwamutam no enyim."

column2: "Na ɔmfa bɔgya no bi nkeka afɔrmbukyia no a ɔwɔ EWURADZE enyim no a ɔwɔ ehyiadzibuw no mu no ne mbɛn ho
column3: na onhue bɔgya no nyinara ngu ɔhyew afɔr afɔrmbukyia no a ɔwɔ ehyiadzibuw no n’abowano ho ase."

column2: "Na onyi ne seradze no nyinara mfi ho
column3: na ɔnhyew no wɔ afɔrmbukyia no do."

column2: "Dɛ mbrɛ ɔyɛɛ bɔn ho afɔr nantwisaa no
column3: dɛmara so na ɔnyɛ iyi na ɔsɔfo no mpata mma hɔn

column2: "Na ɔmfa nantwisaa no mfir edzi nkɔ nseraban no ekyir
column3: na ɔnhyew no dɛ mbrɛ ɔhyeew asɔpɔn nantwisaa no. Iyi yɛ bagua no hɔn bɔn ho afɔr."

column2: "Sɛ otsitsir bi ammfa enyidaho na ɔyɛ bɔn
column3: na ɔyɛ EWURADZE ne Nyankopɔn ndzɛmba nyinara a wɔahyɛ dɛ mma wɔnnyɛ no mu kor bi ma odzi so;"

column2: "na sɛ wɔma ohu no bɔn a ɔafom wɔ mu no a
column3: ɔmfa n’ayɛyɛdze a ɔyɛ apɔnkye mbra

column2: "na ɔmfa ne nsa nto apɔnkye no n’etsifi
column3: na onku no wɔ beebi mbrɛ woku ɔhyew afɔr no wɔ EWURADZE enyim no. Iyi yɛ bɔn ho afɔr."

column2: "Na ɔsɔfo no mfa ne nsatseaba mfa bɔn ho afɔr bɔgyaa no bi
column3: na ɔmfa nkeka ɔhyew afɔr afɔrmbukyia no ne mmbɛn ho
column4: na onhue no bɔgyaa no ngu ɔhyew afɔr afɔrmbukyia no ase."

column2: "Na ɔnhyew ne seradze no nyinara wɔ afɔrmbukyia no do
column3: dɛ asomdwee afɔr ayɛyɛdze seradze no: na ɔsɔfo no mpata mma no wɔ no bɔn no ho

column2: "Na sɛ ɔman mba no bi ammfa enyidaho na ɔyɛ bɔn wɔ ndzɛmba nyinara a EWURADZE ahyɛ ho mbra dɛ mma wɔnnyɛ no mu biara a
column3: odzi so."

column2: "Sɛ wɔma ohu no bɔn a ɔafom no a ɔno ɔmfa n’ayɛyɛdze
column3: apɔnkyeber a onndzii dzɛm
column5: wɔ no bɔn a ɔayɛ no ntsi."

column2: "Na ɔmfa ne nsa nto bɔn ho afɔr no n’etsifi
column3: na onku bɔn ho afɔr no wɔ ɔhyew afɔr bea no do."

column2: "Na ɔsɔfo no mfa ne nsatseaba mfa bɔgya no bi
column3: na ɔmfa nkeka ɔhyew afɔr afɔrmbukyia no ne mmbɛn ho
column4: na onhue no bɔgyaa no nyinara ngu afɔrmbukyia no ase."

column2: "Na onyi ne seradze no nyinara
column3: dɛ mbrɛ woyi asomdwee afɔr seradze no fi ho no; na ɔsɔfo no nhyew no wɔ afɔrmbukyia no do ma onyi nka huanhuam mma EWURADZE; na ɔsɔfo no mpata mma no

column2: "Na sɛ ɔdze eguambaa ba dɛ n’ayɛyɛdze wɔ bɔn ho afɔr ntsi a
column3: ɔmfa ɔber a onndzii dzɛm mbra."

column2: "Na ɔmfa ne nsa nto bɔn no afɔr abowa no n’etsifi
column3: na onku no bɔn ho afɔr wɔ beebi mbrɛ woku ɔhyew afɔr no."

column2: "Na ɔsɔfo no mfa ne nsatseaba mfa bɔn ho afɔr bɔgyaa no bi
column3: na ɔmfa nkeka ɔhyew afɔr afɔrmbukyia no ne mbɛn ho
column4: na onhue no bɔgyaa no nyinara ngu afɔrmbukyia no ase:"

column2: "na onyi ne seradze no nyinara
column3: dɛ mbrɛ woyi asomdwee afɔr eguambaa seradze no fi ho no; na ɔsɔfo no nhyew no wɔ afɔrmbukyia no do
column4: wɔ EWURADZE ogya afɔr no do: na ɔsɔfo no mpata mma no wɔ no bɔn a ɔayɛ no ho
